LanguageData.rim73_hediff_note: This optimises the hediffs and health ticks by reducing time it takes and improving memory caching.
LanguageData.rim73_mood_note: Enables mood optimisations, this reduces unecessary checks.
LanguageData.rim73_needs_note: Enable needs optimisations by reducing the amount of checks in a second.
LanguageData.rim73_pather_note: Enable pather optimisations by preventing pawns to tick if there's someone blocking their path, they will go into "pathing sleep" unless they get attacked.
LanguageData.rim73_jobs_note: Enable jobs optimisations by reducing checks to nil for enemies and reducing them for pawns.
